phase1.title: Foundation & Tokenization
objectives: Planning and development of investment model.
Creation of Engyx Digital Energy Inc.
Creation and configuration of the $ENGYX token.
Website launch, social media presence, whitepaper, and marketing.

phase2.title: Token Launch
objectives: Pre-Sale. (Capital raised for operational expenses and initial development).
Public Sale through Launchpool. (Fundraising for project development and ecosystem expansion).

phase3.title: Operational Kickoff
objectives: Evaluation of investment opportunities, acquisition studies, or bidding for the development of a solar plant and energy storage systems. (Permits and studies)

phase4.title: Execution & Governance
objectives: Final investment decision (FID) and execution agreement for the solar plant project.
Development of an integrated platform for monitoring project progress.

phase5.title: Platform and Market Development
objectives: Development of a platform for the sale of tokenized energy, integrated with a fiat/crypto wallet and identity verification system (KYC).
Launch of the tokenized energy market.

phase6.title: Operational Launch & Energy Generation
objectives: Full operational launch of the solar plant.

phase7.title: Internationalization and Social Responsibility
objectives: Strategic alliances in LATAM and Europe.
Exploration of new solar, wind, and green hydrogen energy projects.
Launch of the Corporate Social Responsibility program (RSC).
